property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Result Values Group

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Detailed information about a group of result values.
This grouping can be expressed two ways: (1) as an explicit list of values, i.e. A, B, C, etc (2) as a range of numeric values 1-100 with .01 increments
It may also combine the two approaches. (3) A numeric range for a grade 1-100 but also allow for grades like I for incomplete.
Note: This object has been renamed from R1, previously it was called ResultComponent.

property.name: summary
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: description
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Result Scale Key

property.name: summary
property.value: The scale to which this group belongs.

property.name: label
property.value: Result Scale Key

property.name: description
property.value: The scale to which this group belongs. Result Values mapped to a Result Values Group belong to a single Result Scale.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Result Value Keys

property.name: summary
property.value: Contains the list of discrete results value keys in this group.

property.name: label
property.value: Result Value Keys

property.name: elementLabel
property.value: Result Value Key

property.name: description
property.value: Contains the list of discrete results value keys in this group.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Result Value Range

property.name: summary
property.value: The range contained within this result value group.

property.name: label
property.value: Result Value Range

property.name: description
property.value: The range contained within this result value group. This is optional and might not be present for some Result Components

property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Result Value Range

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: The range contained within this result value group. This is optional and might not be present for some Result Components

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Min Value

property.name: summary
property.value: Min Result Value string Lower end of the value range.

property.name: label
property.value: Min Value

property.name: description
property.value: Min Result Value string Lower end of the value range. Typically corresponds with the short coded form of the result(ex. "1.0", "25.0" etc.) Should the data resultTypeKey of values (min/max) be numbers and not Strings in the value range?

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Max Value

property.name: summary
property.value: Max Result Value string Upper end of the value range.

property.name: label
property.value: Max Value

property.name: description
property.value: Max Result Value string Upper end of the value range. Typically corresponds with the short coded form of the result(ex. "3.0", "100.0" etc.). Upper end can be left empty to indicate unbounded upper end.

property.name: summary
property.value: Increment number Legal increments in the result values.

property.name: description
property.value: Increment number Legal increments in the result values. This has to be a decimal e.g 0.5)

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.
